review_title: Overall great place to work at
job_title: Data Analyst in Milton Keynes, England
pros: Its a great environment to work at, the people there are friendly and understanding

review_title: Great for some, less great for others
pros: In most cases a caring workplaces which has employee wellbeing and professional development in mind
cons: This is not always the case and the department you are working within can make all the difference. I have gone from feeling extremely valued to the opposite in a short space of time due to management changes.

pros: Values, rewards, salary, culture and meaningful work.
cons: Leadership and management could listen to employees feedback and take action.
